Our restoration work in action! 

The striking Arctic Charr has been spotted on camera. Once on the verge of extinction, this vital fish species has been given a lifeline thanks to work carried out with @ForestryComm üêüüêüüêü

https://t.co/jA4zRApL94 https://t.co/IemF8UejaZ

tweets.text: My weekly round up üóì Brexit negotiations & @UKWIN_Network event. Constituents opposing Westbury‚Äôs incinerator: please go to the link below to register your comments with the @EnvAgency https://t.co/erMPOBOiIO https://t.co/JA59ZNN6cv

Wow, just got a look at some @NatureMetrics macroinvertebrate #eDNA #metabarcoding data from chalk streams. After some bioinformatics calibration it's even better than we first thought & gives index scores that match @EnvAgency data from the same locations! https://t.co/njXSlizvWF

tweets.text:
@FoeCambridge @lewis_herbert @greenarteries @Feargal_Sharkey @TerryMac999 @markrwilliamson @dottymcl @BBCCambs @CambsCC @wre @GreaterCambs @EnvAgency @DefraUK @cllrbridget @ab4scambs @OliviaRudgard @camcitco @cllrkatie @DanielZeichner @SouthCambs @mhclg @DefraGovUK Net zero carbon is one thing, but (conveniently?) ignores #water.

We are in a #ClimateEmergency, but also a #NatureEmergency.

Water is the basis of life. Without it our ecosystems collapse.

We need Net Zero Water too. https://t.co/jGkUPXGes5

tweets.text: Nice footage of #NFM interventions at Tebay, Cumbria by @ITVborder showing NFM monitoring by @NERC_QNFM of @LancasterUni on @cumbriawildlife peat-dams and log-dams installed by Tebay farmers with @EnvAgencyNW funds. Watch: https://t.co/VqGwJwVpau https://t.co/7wBhoqB2rk

BEFORE & AFTER

Appalling #EcoVandalism at The #RiverLugg SSSI #Herefordshire

THIS IS ILLEGAL ACTIVITY

So it's a CRITICAL TEST CASE for environmental enforcement by @NaturalEngland @EnvAgency @DefraGovUK

The @WildlifeTrusts will be making sure appropriate legal action is taken https://t.co/U8lt4ZuX1t

@lewis_herbert @MonicaHone @Feargal_Sharkey @TerryMac999 @markrwilliamson @dottymcl @BBCCambs @CambsCC @wre @GreaterCambs @EnvAgency @DefraUK @cllrbridget @ab4scambs @OliviaRudgard @camcitco @cllrkatie @DanielZeichner @SouthCambs @mhclg Good to hear. Any mention of #OxCamArc building million homes? The impact of unbridled growth on Cam chalk streams? @DefraGovUK doubling nature metrics are not tried or tested. Grazed water meadows & chalk downlands are the backbone of Cambridge‚Äôs landscape & city‚Äôs green belt.

@greenarteries @MonicaHone @Feargal_Sharkey @TerryMac999 @markrwilliamson @dottymcl @BBCCambs @CambsCC @wre @GreaterCambs @EnvAgency @DefraUK @cllrbridget @ab4scambs @OliviaRudgard @camcitco @cllrkatie @DanielZeichner @SouthCambs @mhclg @DefraGovUK Central principle, despite increasing national controls, is a sovereign net zero carbon Local Plan with full engagement. And on water we need to work as a team and challenge @EnvAgency and companies.

tweets.text: Amazing talk by @Feargal_Sharkey on the disastrous neglect by policymakers and @EnvAgency of the Cam and other rivers. Tells us to take inspiration for a civic fight back from the Northern Ireland Civil Rights Movement.

@MonicaHone @Feargal_Sharkey @TerryMac999 @markrwilliamson @dottymcl @BBCCambs @CambsCC @wre @GreaterCambs @EnvAgency @DefraUK @cllrbridget @ab4scambs @OliviaRudgard Have @camcitco councillors signed this letter? @cllrkatie @lewis_herbert @DanielZeichner the River Cam chalk streams & the grazed meadows & chalk downland are the backbone of the Cambridge landscape. It is crucial that communities have a say about this. https://t.co/0oIkX3o0bW

Espero que lo difundan para que nuestras autoridades aprendan y no reconstruyan en vano https://t.co/ZZNRXt8J3Y

A spokesperson for @EnvAgency: ‚ÄúEvidence shows that the CURRENT levels of abstraction are having a detrimental effect on the rivers within the Cambridge area. ANY increase in abstraction will cause more pressure on water resources and FURTHER DETERIORATE the water environment."
"@EnvAgency has already owned up that the River Cam and its tributaries are in a declining state. They are in the process of being drained dry and the remains of them filled full of sewage."

We‚Äôve been working with @EnvAgencySW to deliver a plan that will better protect homes and businesses from flooding whilst creating green spaces, habitats and places to enjoy nature. 

What do you think? 

üëáüèª 

https://t.co/ikpo8cpOEK

The Water Environment Grant, Esk Restoration project is in full swing! Here's NYMNPA staff planting riparian vegetation at Ainthorpeüåø. @EnvAgency @ForestryComm Such fabulous clean water quality in this film

Our NFM measures (felled + pinned trees) are now living up to their name as leaky woody debris dams,  holding back water in high flows and creating new in-stream habitats in Dalby Forest.¬†Great to see new growth on the coppiced alders too. @Dalby_Forest @josh_NFM @EnvAgencyYNE https://t.co/rc0QUlEn0y
